awards:
第39届马德普拉塔电影节(2024)
　　阿根廷竞赛单元 最佳长片奖(提名) 巴勃罗·塞萨尔

director.name: 巴勃罗·塞萨尔 Pablo César

introduction: Gloria is a distinguished painter, writer and gallery owner from Argentina. After a long and intense life, dedicated to her family and art, Gloria faces her darkest times: her husband, with whom she has been together since adolescence, decides to leave the country. And illnesses begin to threaten her very life. She begins to feel that each step is a fight with a "duende" from the work of Lorca. After the End is based on real events.
